Class RecursiveAutoEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.BaseLayer<RecursiveAutoEncoder>
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.layers.feedforward.autoencoder.recursive.RecursiveAutoEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Layer, Model

    public class RecursiveAutoEncoder
extends BaseLayer<RecursiveAutoEncoder>
    Recursive AutoEncoder. Uses back propagation through structure.
